body: Just out of curiosity - if we've gotten here, that means that the fuzzer has provided random input that has happened to correspond to a utxo snapshot that matches the chain we've generated in setup. This seems extraordinarily unlikely to me; how often do we expect this to actually happen? Am I missing some mechanic about how the fuzzer works that makes this a more frequent thing?
